objective: Infiltrate the prestigious 'Museum of Antiquities' during its annual gala to steal the legendary 'Serpent's Eye' diamond from the impenetrable Obsidian Vault.

locations.name: The Velvet Gauntlet
locations.description: A dazzling gauntlet of paparazzi flashes and velvet ropes guards the opulent entrance, leading into the glittering main hall where elite guests arrive.
locations.visual: Red carpet under a grand archway, blinding paparazzi flashes, velvet ropes, elegant masked guests in evening wear.

locations.name: The Celestial Rotunda
locations.description: Beneath a massive, ornate dome depicting constellations, hundreds of masked guests mingle, their whispers echoing softly in the vast, marble-floored space.
locations.visual: Vast rotunda, detailed celestial dome ceiling, elegant masked guests, polished marble floors, soft, ambient lighting.

locations.name: The Whispering Exhibits
locations.description: Dimly lit corridors lined with ancient, priceless artifacts lead away from the main gala, less frequented by revelers but rich in history.
locations.visual: Long, dimly lit museum corridor, glass display cases with ancient artifacts, muted spotlights, hushed atmosphere.

locations.name: The Eye of Argus
locations.description: A sterile, modern security control room where vigilant guards monitor dozens of screens displaying every angle of the museum's interior and exterior.
locations.visual: Cold, contemporary security room, wall of monitors with CCTV feeds, alert security guards, glowing screens, blinking console lights.

locations.name: The Obsidian Gateway
locations.description: A fortified antechamber, sparse and cold, precedes the vault door, its thick, reinforced steel glowing faintly under emergency lights.
locations.visual: Grey concrete antechamber, massive steel vault door, stark emergency lighting, reinforced walls, pressure sensors.

locations.name: The Serpent's Heart
locations.description: Inside the vault, the air is still and heavy, with the legendary Serpent's Eye diamond gleaming ominously on a central, laser-guarded pedestal.
locations.visual: Circular vault interior, central pedestal with a glittering diamond, laser grid security, dark obsidian walls, cool, contained atmosphere.

items.name: The Curator's Hidden Key
items.description: A master key, discreetly tucked away for emergencies.
items.visual: An ornate, antique brass key, dull with age, hanging on a small, almost invisible hook behind a heavy velvet curtain.

items.name: The Gala Guest List
items.description: The official list of attendees, detailing their names and VIP status.
items.visual: A thick, leather-bound guest book with gold-embossed lettering, open on a polished mahogany podium, a silver pen resting beside it.

items.name: Security Monitor Log
items.description: A digital tablet displaying the current security camera feeds.
items.visual: A sleek, modern tablet screen glowing faintly, showing multiple monochrome camera views of the museum's entrance and hallways, resting on a small, unobtrusive table near a reception desk.

items.name: Star-Chart Cipher
items.description: An ancient parchment depicting constellations, with cryptic notations.
items.visual: A brittle, rolled-up parchment scroll, yellowed with age, covered in hand-drawn star charts and faint, swirling script, hidden behind a loose stone in a display pedestal.

items.name: Astral Compass
items.description: A small, intricate device used for celestial navigation.
items.visual: A palm-sized antique brass compass, its glass cover slightly fogged, with tiny, detailed planetary engravings on its casing, tucked inside a velvet-lined drawer beneath a telescope display.

items.name: The Silent Bell
items.description: A small, tarnished bell rumored to open secret passages.
items.visual: A diminutive, bronze hand-bell, verdigris covering its surface, with a worn leather handle, concealed within a dusty, forgotten display case of ancient artifacts.

items.name: Argus's Gaze Camera
items.description: A high-resolution security camera, centrally positioned.
items.visual: A modern, sleek black dome camera mounted prominently on the ceiling, with a single red light indicating it's active, surveying a wide exhibition hall.

items.name: The Sapphire Sentinel
items.description: A large sapphire crystal, the centerpiece of the security system.
items.visual: A massive, uncut sapphire gem, glowing with an internal blue light, encased in a reinforced glass pedestal, surrounded by laser grids.

items.name: Guardian Stone Tablet
items.description: An ancient stone tablet depicting mythical guardians.
items.visual: A heavy, dark grey stone tablet, intricately carved with figures of winged beasts and ancient script, mounted on a wall near a grand archway.

items.name: Ceremonial Torch Sconce
items.description: An elaborate iron sconce, once holding a perpetual flame.
items.visual: A large, wrought-iron torch sconce, designed with intertwining serpent motifs, fixed to a column beside a grand entrance, soot stains visible around its opening.

items.name: The Unseen Pressure Plate
items.description: A subtle floor panel triggering an alarm if stepped on.
items.visual: A section of the polished stone floor, indistinguishable from its surroundings, with faint, almost imperceptible lines indicating a hidden pressure plate, located in a narrow corridor.

items.name: The Serpent's Eye Diamond
items.description: The legendary, priceless diamond kept deep within the vault.
items.visual: A colossal, perfectly cut diamond, shimmering with an ethereal green light, resting on a black velvet cushion inside a reinforced, bulletproof glass display case within a high-security vault.

tasks.description: Polish celestial display, avoid laser grids.
Get janitor's override code, unlock service panel.
Swap maintenance cart, block security cameras.
Decipher ancient star-chart, reveal hidden mechanism.
Locate hidden panel, retrieve security schematics.
Convince IT specialist, access server room.
Bypass vault lock, secure the diamond.
Disable pressure plate, avoid floor alarm.
Reroute surveillance feed, create blind spot.
